alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 19 at 4:59AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall will be possible. * WHERE...Portions of western Arizona, including Page, Grand Canyon, Fredonia, the Vermilion Cliffs, Supai, Ash Fork, Seligman, Chino Valley, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Camp Verde, and Black Canyon City. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding will be possible in creeks, normally dry washes, and swimming holes. Low-water crossings could also become flooded, which would create deadly travel conditions. Unpaved roads could become muddy and impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
